RXoSS6pNhpnp0oCpW3QldQ.text: Wow... is all I have to say. Came here for lunch today before class and my girlfriend and I were amazed. I had the beef and chicken kabob combo while she had the chicken shawarma. My combo was amazing. Came with rice, one beef kabob, one chicken kabob, onions, and side of hummus and pita. The hummus and pita were amazing! I love their herb butter with my pita. The kabobs were cooked well and had a nice amount of seasoning on it. All the herbs blended into a nice taste. The shawarma was good according to my girlfriend and it came with zucchini fries. GET THE ZUCCHINI FRIES!!! It just melts in your mouth. Hands down my favorite thing there now.   As far as pricing it's within the $10-$18 price range and you get a good sized portion. Lunch and dinner prices differ so watch for that.  The lady who served us was very friendly and maintained amazing service the whole time. Wish we remembered her name, but she was a nice Asian lady. Overall this place was a good spot to eat and we will be back again for sure.

HP_hdfGM0ZTKvlLcMOh0cg.text: My family and I went here today and the food was really great. The chicken kabob was awesome and so was the lentil soup. The people working there were all wonderful and very very sweet and helpful. We'll definitely be back!

b6NrqxSV215oF7m21SHgcg.text: Since my husband and I discovered this restaurant we cannot get enough of it. We've been back already 5 times since it opened. The food is so authentic and delicous. The staff are so welcoming. I give them 5 stars. Can't wait to get back already and we were just there last night! Love, love, love this place! Best middle eastern restaurant in Vegas PERIOD!!!!

1mb8NjHacXbbMjhvioc4Fg.text: We've been here several times and it is always good! Recommended to a friend for catering a lunch shower - everyone raved. We'll keep coming back.

1gtdHm5RB3rpLpjh0dV4bQ.text: THE Best Mediterranean with a twist food I have ever tasted! I mean do you think it's obsessive that we have eaten here 4 times with 1 time take away? Maybe that's not a lot to you, but I am talking 5 times in 3 weeks. shrimp scampi... the bomb, Greek fries delicious, vegetarian dolmades perfect little finger food! And the ghost pepper hummus, so good that I used the small amount that wasn't noshed, in a vinaigrette dressing for my salad the next day. The puffed up, fresh out of the oven pita... Ahh the smell is divine. Lebanese coffee and desserts sooo good, I have to plan my meal around making a little room for the goodies. All the food we have tried is exploding with flavor.  The atmosphere is so chill I feel completely relaxed from the outside world. I think it's my new happy place!  The staff is very sweet and the chef usually comes out and delivers food to the table, last time he hooked me up with perfectly sweetened Lebanese coffee. Nothing is better than feeling the love and care in the food your eating.

wTbPicXIsz8nXAM0qjecPQ.text: The food is so fresh, the place is so clean and the atmosphere is just amazing. Will be coming here again and frequent.

OwpYCh6i67bghdYjZB7_9g.text: A beautiful restaurant with amazing food and excellent service.The zucchini fries were unbelievably delicious. I can't wait to go back.

OLVzVJucGW1cgiSOVJ3upw.text: Have been here 4 times now this month and it's truly wonderful fresh and delicious!  Highly recommended!

qaXxusW3cGBz0qVBRT6fNg.text: Came in for the first time and I am so glad I chose this place the atmosphere is perfect everything is so new and clean love all the little details. The staff makes you feel at home. Best of all was the food !! Fresh and so delicious I'm going back today for lunch. r8Hp-3HcLRq_bvi_y7cJYQ.text: The food here is just wonderful. I've been hooked from the first time dining at this restaurant since then I've brought friends and family to eat multiple times. I definitely  eat here at least once a week. Combo kabob plate their meat is so good anyone you choose and then the greek burger so great! Top it off the staff are super friendly and helpful.

6OVurUAuHnpDOpj7fo_Qpw.text: Love this place so glad I don't have to stalk them around town and even better they opened 1 block from where I work on Mondays so I go frequently. Portions have always been huge always need a to go box. Tried the pretzel sliders, factory burger, chicken kabobs and regular hummus all SOOOOO good. I have wanted to upgrade and try both of the other types of fries but I always end up spending the extra $$ on hummus and pita bread because I feel empty without it. Restaurant is nice and clean. I usually go during less busy times so I haven't had long waits. Waitresses have been very nice every time. Service always good first time there they were out of pretzel bread so they nicely came over and let me know and apologized which is all I ask for no biggie I had like a list of things I needed to try so I moved on to the next one. Great place! Hope it succeeds.

WGEpnHJQ0dsf0chzgiAIUw.text: Amazing food! Great ambience as well! Lunch or dinner, great place to go! Definitely recommending this place to everyone!

9V9r-n4tESxCa3GgT060Lg.text: Lovely space, staff warm and welcoming. Food wonderful. I have Falafel Plate which was a huge amount of crisp non greasy falafel balls served on a bed of marinated veggies. All super good. Had a side order of baba ganoush which was lovely. I tasted the hummus which is light and very creamy. Pita bread came to the table puffed, warm and delicious.  We were a party of 15 people which they handled beautifully. It is a new restaurant in business for 3 weeks, Go there for wonderful Lebanese food.

DuqvowaoaLvxeEd3biBAeg.text: One of my favorite restaurants in Las Vegas !! The food is excellent . The beautifully decorated restaurant  provides a clean relaxing atmosphere while enjoying the great food. The staff is super friendly and the Owner comes out from time to time checking on all the tables making sure everyone is satisfied! This is a Must try place if your a local or just visiting, I normally have a very bland pallet and im not always open to trying new foods but im definitely glad ive tried this place otherwise id be missing out!! My favorite off the menu is the factory salad , the kabobs , and the factory burger . Delish!!!

O4OStUZJzXk9maJGq8u_fg.text: This place was so delicious, everything was very fresh. We had the hummus, greek salad, falafel's, and greek fries and everything was amazing. The staff was friendly and personable. Definitely will be going back here for lunch next time we are in Vegas! I wish there was a Chicago location

TDvqyDCRl1dCLF4v70bwPw.text: This place is absolutely phenomenal. I grew up with half my family being Lebanese and this is as good as I can get without going home. The servers are so genuine and quick to help in any way they can. Can't wait to come back.

8116BEydfRNz8IX1V7-PDw.text: Friendly and simple atmosphere at The Hummus Factory. Quick and accurate service. We had the hummus and tabulli as a starter. It was fresh and delicious. A definite place I will come back too!
